CustomField.description: Loan Status at time of Hardship Request Date. If the loan status changes between hardship request date and mod processing date, this field should reflect the loan status at time of hardship request date.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Loan Status at time of Hardship Request Date. If the loan status changes between hardship request date and mod processing date, this field should reflect the loan status at time of hardship request date.
CustomField.label: Status Prior to Modification
